revised_title: Improvements to the Expansion Apparatus for Visualizing Ionizing Particle Tracks in Gases
tldr: The author describes improvements to an expansion apparatus that makes ionizing particle tracks visible in gases. The new design allows for better control of the initial volume, expansion ratio, and electric field, enabling the visualization of even the fastest beta-particles' tracks. The author also shares results obtained using the improved apparatus, including photographs of particle tracks and the effects of X-rays on the cloud chamber.
